bug.description:
<denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/tutorials/keras/basic_regression#split_features_from_labels>https://www.tensorflow.org/tutorials/keras/basic_regression#split_features_from_labels</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-code>def plot_history(history): plt.figure() plt.xlabel('Epoch') plt.ylabel('Mean Abs Error [MPG]') plt.plot(hist['epoch'], hist['mean_absolute_error'], label='Train Error') </denchmark-code>
This function references hist instead of history so it doesn't parse.
